description: An ancient place, cited: BAtlas 47 G3 Cyclopum Scopuli Tres
details:
The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Isole dei Ciclopi (‘I Faraglioni’)

See Gibson (2006: 285) commentary on Statius for a summary of the debate about the ancient deployment and understanding of this toponym.

properties.description: OpenStreetMap representative point of the island chain
properties.title: Arcipelago dei Ciclopi

locations.description: OpenStreetMap representative point of the island chain
locations.details: This is probably Odysseus' "Port of the Cylops", one of his stopovers.

references.formattedCitation: CUISENIER, J. « Le Périple d'Ulysse », Paris, Fayard, 2003.
